constraints.name: triangle_inequality
constraints.description: 三个正整数a, b, c构成非退化三角形的条件是：a + b > c, a + c > b, b + c > a
constraints.formal: a + b > c and a + c > b and b + c > a

constraints.name: uniqueness_constraint
constraints.description: 必须唯一确定所有隐藏整数a_i，否则报告无法唯一确定

constraints.name: range_bound
constraints.description: 每个隐藏整数a_i的值在1到4之间
